procedure.name: DeleteCallForwarding
procedure.statement: SELECT s_id FROM subscriber WHERE sub_nbr = ?
DELETE FROM call_forwarding WHERE s_id = ? AND sf_type = ? AND start_time = ?

procedure.name: GetAccessData
procedure.statement: SELECT data1, data2, data3, data4 FROM access_info WHERE s_id = ? AND ai_type = ?

procedure.name: GetNewDestination
procedure.statement: SELECT cf.numberx FROM special_facility sf, call_forwarding cf WHERE sf.s_id = ? AND sf.sf_type = ? AND sf.is_active = 1 AND cf.s_id = sf.s_id AND cf.sf_type = sf.sf_type AND cf.start_time <= ? AND cf.end_time > ?

procedure.name: InsertCallForwarding
procedure.statement: SELECT s_id FROM subscriber WHERE sub_nbr = ?
SELECT sf_type FROM special_facility WHERE s_id = ?

procedure.name: UpdateLocation
procedure.statement: SELECT s_id FROM subscriber WHERE sub_nbr = ?
UPDATE subscriber SET vlr_location = ? WHERE s_id = ?

procedure.name: UpdateSubscriberData
procedure.statement: UPDATE subscriber SET bit_1 = ? WHERE s_id = ?
UPDATE special_facility SET data_a = ? WHERE s_id = ? AND sf_type = ?
